Description: Newly Renovated! Bright & spacious 3 bedroom, 2 full bath second floor apartment spread out over 2 floors of living space including the master with an en suite full bathroom. The first floor includes a nice sized family room open to the dining room & kitchen. Hardwoods throughout, in unit laundry, granite counters, stainless appliances, breakfast bar & 2 decks! Plenty of extra storage space, Off Street parking for 2 cars. No pets, no smoking & strong credit required.
